name: Wine Bottle Opener Corkscrew Set – Luxiluxy [2023 upgraded, does NOT break!] Including Foil Cutter, Bottle Stopper, Opener Stand and Extra Spiral - corkscrews wine opener set- wine opener kit
about_this_item: 【Unparalleled Quality! 15% Heavier & Solid】 The 2024 upgraded wine bottle opener set is made with Top Quality and Commercial grade stainless steel for long-term durability. It is 15% heavier and more solid than offered on the market (1.1 lb vs others' 0.95 lb or less), which means this opener will last longer!

【Easy to use & No broken cork!】 The classic corkscrew bottle opener is famous for extremely easy to use one-pull operation that ensures fast and smooth usage. Our spiral is specially coated with Teflon to ensure smooth pushing into the cork with one single pull. No more struggle with broken cork or openers!

【All you need perfect wine gift set】 This complete 5-piece wine accessories gift set includes an opener, foil cutter, stopper, stand, and extra spiral for replacement making it a complete set all you need!
【Luxurious package for gift】 It comes with a luxurious matte box engraved with a silver logo package; making it the perfect gift idea for wine lovers, men and women.
【100% satisfaction】 If you are unhappy for any reason, contact us and we will send you another set free of charge. This is the last wine opener you ever need!

title: Absolutely Love These
content: These work great! I love them so much I buy them for gifts for friends. They make opening easy and last for several years. They are just as beautiful in person as they are in the pictures.

title: Don't buy it!

title: Verified Purchase
content: I purchased the Luxiluxy Premium Wine Opener Set on 2/5/2024 and immediately loved it; aesthetically appealing and convenient to leave on the counter top. It functioned perfectly for six months, but then in August 2024, the lever mechanism broke, preventing the screw from retracting and removing the cork. Though perhaps of lesser importance, the coating on the wine bottle stop (included in the kit) peeled off after several months of use and became unusable. According to the statement on the Luxiluxy warranty card, “Your satisfaction is our No.1 priority”, and additionally provides several ways to contact the company, “If you have any questions or concerns with your purchase.”. That said, I sent an email (including photos) to CustomerService@Luxiluxy.com on 8/24/2024, explaining the situation and requesting assistance, but have yet to receive a reply. I would have expected this product to be one of quality and certainly would have expected their customer service department to, at the very least, respond to my email request for assistance. Very disappointed. I have since sent a follow up email to CustomerService@Luxiluxy.com, and should I get a reply from them, will post an update advising of such.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had a heavy-duty, bar-top wine bottle un-corker but it broke. Not wanting to spend $100-$200 to replace it, I chose this handheld option. It works better than what it replaced. It firmly grips the bottle and the corkscrew easily does the job with almost no resistance or effort. When finished, it releases the cork flawlessly. The foil cutter works well, with one or two twists. The tool comes with a plastic stand that isn't fancy. It has a slot for the foil cutter and does the job. In short, this is extremely easy to use, space saving, and actually quite attractive setting on top of my bar.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2024

title: gift.
content: I bought my Luxiluxy opener in March 2021 after breaking yet another rabbit-style opener that was mostly plastic. It's exactly the same product ID as the current one; they just seem to update the listing each year to have the current date. When I bought it this was pretty new on the market so it had mostly positive reviews... now it's been out a few years you can look at reviews from people like me that have had it for a bit and are disappointed. This is my fourth rabbit-style opener (the first was a low-cost legit one that used too much plastic) so I'm very familiar with how they work. This is by far the worst I have ever owned in terms of usability.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: So, the critical parts are in fact metal, with minimal plastic used in the construction, and it is pretty heavy. The finish looks nice even a couple years later, and we don't bother with trying to keep it looking pretty. The foil cutter still works after several hundred bottles. Those are the plusses.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2024

title: Broke opening a bottle of wine...
content: After opening about 12 bottles of wine, the corkscrew broke.  Within an hour of their receiving my complaint and a photo of the issue, a new corkscrew was shipped to me. 5 stars for their customer service.  Thank you Bianca!
